line.text: How heavy do I journey on the way
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When what I seek (my weary travel end)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Doth teach that case and that repose to say
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thus far the miles are measured from thy friend
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The beast that bears me tired with my woe
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Plods dully on to bear that weight in me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As if by some instinct the wretch did know
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: His rider loved not speed being made from thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The bloody spur cannot provoke him on
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That sometimes anger thrusts into his hide
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which heavily he answers with a groan
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: More sharp to me than spurring to his side
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For that same groan doth put this in my mind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My grief lies onward and my joy behind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
